item.text: Now one day, as Jesus was teaching the people in the temple courts and proclaiming the gospel, the chief priests and the experts in the law with the elders came up

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="3004">Tell</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us:</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">By</st> <st data-num="4169" class="">what</st> <st data-num="1849" class="">authority</st><n id="2" /> are you <st data-num="4160" class="">doing</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">these things</st>?<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2228" class="">Or</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">who</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> it who <st data-num="1325" class="">gave</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1849" class="">authority</st>?”

He <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="2504">I</st> will <st data-num="2504">also</st> <st data-num="2065" class="">ask</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> a <st data-num="3056" class="">question</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> you <st data-num="3004">tell</st> <st data-num="1473">me:</st>

<st data-num="2491">John’s</st> <st data-num="908" class="">baptism</st><n id="1" />—<st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> it <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="444" class="">people</st>?”<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> they <st data-num="4817" class="">discussed</st> it <st data-num="4314" class="">with</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">one another</st>, <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “<st data-num="1437">If</st> we <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st>, ‘<st data-num="1537">From</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven,’</st> he will <st data-num="3004">say</st>, ‘<st data-num="1223 5101">Why</st> did you <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him?’</st>

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> we <st data-num="3004">say</st>, ‘<st data-num="1537">From</st> <st data-num="2992" class="">people,’</st> <st data-num="537">all</st> the <st data-num="2992" class="">people</st> will <st data-num="2642">stone</st> <st data-num="1473">us</st> <st data-num="1063">because</st> they are <st data-num="3982" class="">convinced</st> that <st data-num="2491" class="">John</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> a <st data-num="4396" class="">prophet</st>.”

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> they <st data-num="611" class="">replied</st> that they did <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4159" class="">where</st> it came <st data-num="4159">from</st>.
Then Jesus said to them, “Neither will I tell you by whose authority I do these things.”
Then he began to tell the people this parable: “A man planted a vineyard, leased it to tenant farmers, and went on a journey for a long time.

When <st data-num="2540" class="">harvest time</st> came, he <st data-num="649">sent</st> a <st data-num="1401" class="">slave</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="1092" class="">tenants</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">so that</st> they would <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> his <st data-num="2590" class="">portion</st> of the <st data-num="290" class="">crop</st>.<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">However</st>, the <st data-num="1092" class="">tenants</st> <st data-num="1194" class="">beat</st> his slave<n id="4" /> and <st data-num="1821" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1821" class="">away</st> <st data-num="2756" class="">empty-handed</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="1821" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="2087" class="">another</st> <st data-num="1401" class="">slave</st>. They <st data-num="1194" class="">beat</st> <st data-num="2548">this one too</st>, <st data-num="818" class="">treated</st> him <st data-num="818" class="">outrageously</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1821" class="">sent</st> him <st data-num="1821" class="">away</st> <st data-num="2756" class="">empty-handed</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="3992">sent</st> <st data-num="4369" class="">still</st> a <st data-num="5154" class="">third</st>. They <st data-num="2532" class="">even</st> <st data-num="5135" class="">wounded</st> <st data-num="3778">this one</st> and <st data-num="1544" class="">threw</st> him <st data-num="1544" class="">out</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="2962" class="">owner</st> of the <st data-num="290" class="">vineyard</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st>, ‘<st data-num="5101">What</st> should I <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st>? I will <st data-num="3992" class="">send</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> one <st data-num="27" class="">dear</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">son;</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2481" class="">perhaps</st> they will <st data-num="1788" class="">respect</st> <st data-num="3778">him</st>.’

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> when the <st data-num="1092" class="">tenants</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, they <st data-num="1260" class="">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="240">one another</st>, ‘<st data-num="3778">This</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="2818" class="">heir;</st> let’s <st data-num="615" class="">kill</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">so</st> the <st data-num="2817" class="">inheritance</st> will <st data-num="1096" class="">be</st> <st data-num="1473">ours</st>!’

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> they <st data-num="1544" class="">threw</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1544">out</st> <st data-num="1854" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="290" class="">vineyard</st> and <st data-num="615" class="">killed</st><n id="2" /> him. <st data-num="5101" class="">What</st> <st data-num="3767" class="">then</st> will the <st data-num="2962" class="">owner</st> of the <st data-num="290" class="">vineyard</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>?

He will <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="622" class="">destroy</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3778" class="">those</st> <st data-num="1092" class="">tenants</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> the <st data-num="290" class="">vineyard</st> to <st data-num="243" class="">others</st>.”<n id="2" /> When the people<n id="3" /> <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> this, they <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “May this <st data-num="3361" class="">never</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">happen</st>!”<n id="4" />
But Jesus looked straight at them and said, “Then what is the meaning of that which is written: ‘The stone the builders rejected has become the cornerstone’?

<st data-num="3956" class="">Everyone</st> who <st data-num="4098" class="">falls</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">this</st> <st data-num="3037" class="">stone</st> will be <st data-num="4917" class="">broken to pieces</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="846">one</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> it <st data-num="4098" class="">falls</st> will be <st data-num="3039" class="">crushed</st>.”<n id="2" />
Then the experts in the law and the chief priests wanted to arrest him that very hour because they realized he had told this parable against them. But they were afraid of the people.

Then they watched him carefully and sent spies who pretended to be sincere. They wanted to take advantage of what he might say so that they could deliver him up to the authority and jurisdiction of the governor.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Thus</st><n id="1" /> they <st data-num="1905" class="">asked</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="1320">Teacher</st>, we <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> you <st data-num="3004" class="">speak</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1321" class="">teach</st> <st data-num="3723" class="">correctly</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2983" class="">show</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="4383" class="">partiality</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1321" class="">teach</st> the <st data-num="3598" class="">way</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1909">in accordance with</st> the <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st>.<n id="3" />

Is it <st data-num="1832" class="">right</st><n id="1" /> for <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> to <st data-num="1325" class="">pay</st> the <st data-num="5411">tribute tax</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="2541" class="">Caesar</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st>?”

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> Jesus<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2657" class="">perceived</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="3834" class="">deceit</st><n id="2" /> and <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>,

“<st data-num="1166">Show</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> a <st data-num="1220" class="">denarius</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="5101" class="">Whose</st> <st data-num="1504" class="">image</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1923" class="">inscription</st> <st data-num="2192">are</st> on it?”<n id="3" /> They <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="2541">Caesar’s</st>.”

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="5106">Then</st> <st data-num="591" class="">give</st> to <st data-num="2541" class="">Caesar</st> the things that are <st data-num="2541">Caesar’s</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> the things that are <st data-num="2316">God’s</st>.”<n id="2" />
Thus they were unable in the presence of the people to trap him with his own words. And stunned by his answer, they fell silent.
Now some Sadducees (who contend that there is no resurrection) came to him.
They asked him, “Teacher, Moses wrote for us that if a man’s brother dies leaving a wife but no children, that man must marry the widow and father children for his brother.

<st data-num="3767">Now</st> there <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="2033" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="80" class="">brothers</st>. The <st data-num="4413">first one</st> <st data-num="2983" class="">married</st> a <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="599" class="">died</st> <st data-num="815">without children</st>.
The <st data-num="1208">second</st><n id="1" />

<st data-num="2532">and then</st> the <st data-num="5154" class="">third</st> <st data-num="2983" class="">married</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5615">in this same way</st> all <st data-num="2033" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="599" class="">died</st>, <st data-num="2641" class="">leaving</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="5043" class="">children</st>.
<st data-num="5306">Finally</st> the <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st> <st data-num="599" class="">died</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">too</st>.
In the resurrection, therefore, whose wife will the woman be? For all seven had married her.”
So Jesus said to them, “The people of this age marry and are given in marriage.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> those who are <st data-num="2661">regarded as worthy</st> to <st data-num="5177" class="">share</st> in<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1565" class="">that</st> <st data-num="165" class="">age</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> in the <st data-num="386" class="">resurrection</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="3498" class="">dead</st> <st data-num="3777" class="">neither</st> <st data-num="1060" class="">marry</st> <st data-num="3777" class="">nor</st> are <st data-num="1061">given in marriage</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">In fact</st>, they <st data-num="1410" class="">can</st> <st data-num="3761" class="">no</st> <st data-num="2089" class="">longer</st> <st data-num="599" class="">die</st> <st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> they <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="2465">equal to angels</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">sons</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, since they <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="5207" class="">sons</st><n id="3" /> of the <st data-num="386" class="">resurrection</st>.
But even Moses revealed that the dead are raised in the passage about the bush, where he calls the Lord the God of Abraham and the God of Isaac and the God of Jacob.

<st data-num="1161">Now</st> he <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> of the <st data-num="3498" class="">dead</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> of the <st data-num="2198" class="">living</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="2198" class="">live</st> before <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.”<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="5100" class="">some</st> of the <st data-num="1122">experts in the law</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">answered</st>, “<st data-num="1320">Teacher</st>, you have <st data-num="3004">spoken</st> <st data-num="2573" class="">well</st>!”<n id="3" />
For they did not dare any longer to ask him anything.
But he said to them, “How is it that they say that the Christ is David’s son?

For David himself says in the book of Psalms,

‘The Lord said to my lord,

“Sit at my right hand,
until I make your enemies a footstool for your feet.”’
If David then calls him ‘Lord,’ how can he be his son?”
As all the people were listening, Jesus said to his disciples,

“<st data-num="4337">Beware</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="575" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="1122" class="">experts in the law</st>.<n id="2" /> They<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2309" class="">like</st> <st data-num="4043" class="">walking around</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4749" class="">long robes</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they <st data-num="5368" class="">love</st> <st data-num="783">elaborate greetings</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="58" class="">marketplaces</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="4410">best seats</st><n id="6" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4864" class="">synagogues</st><n id="7" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="4411">places of honor</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">at</st> <st data-num="1173" class="">banquets</st>.
They devour widows’ property, and as a show make long prayers. They will receive a more severe punishment.”
